content:
I just opened #14557. The main change is making the unused tactic linter read the tactics that are allowed to be "unused" from a dynamically modifiable list.

This allows to modify such list, for instance to include done as an admissible tactic.

Specifically for done, allowing it to not trigger the linter is very useful for teaching purposes.
Copying from the other thread: I just left some comments. The implementation looks good to me, but I'd like an expert to double-check the IO.Ref part and the logic of the new command.
